languages.text: На выступающих мазках масла скопилась пыль — похоже, если прислуга и получает доступ в эту комнату, то крайне редко.

traits.locale_text: Из старых, поблекших от времени динамиков доносится треск и едва различимая тягучая мелодия.

languages.text: Dust has accumulated on the raised oil smears — if servants ever access this room, they do so very rarely.
languages.original_text: На выступающих мазках масла скопилась пыль — похоже, если прислуга и получает доступ в эту комнату, то крайне редко.

traits.locale_text: Dust has accumulated on the raised oil smears — if servants ever access this room, they do so very rarely.
Dust has accumulated on the raised oil smears — if servants ever access this room, they do so very rarely.
Dust has accumulated on the raised oil smears — if servants ever access this room, they do so very rarely.
Crackling and a barely audible plaintive melody come from the old, worn speakers.

languages.text: 油渍上积满了灰尘，就算这个房间真的有仆人来过，恐怕也仅仅是匆匆经过便离开了。
languages.original_text: Dust has accumulated on the raised oil smears — if servants ever access this room, they do so very rarely.

traits.locale_text: 破旧的扬声器中，发出了噼里啪啦的声音与几乎听不到的平淡旋律。

languages.text: El polvo se ha acumulado en las manchas de aceite. Si los sirvientes visitan este lugar, debe de ser algo muy esporádico.
languages.original_text: Dust has accumulated on the raised oil smears — if servants ever access this room, they do so very rarely.

traits.locale_text: Un chisporroteo y una melodía quejosa casi inaudible brotan de los viejos y gastados altavoces.

languages.text: ホコリが油の膜の上に堆積している…使用人はこの部屋にはめったに出入りしないのだろう。
languages.original_text: Dust has accumulated on the raised oil smears — if servants ever access this room, they do so very rarely.

traits.locale_text: ホコリが油の膜の上に堆積している…使用人はこの部屋にはめったに出入りしないのだろう。

languages.text: Auf den Ölfilmen hat sich Staub angesammelt ... sollten Diener diesen Raum jemals betreten, dann nur sehr selten.
languages.original_text: Dust has accumulated on the raised oil smears — if servants ever access this room, they do so very rarely.

traits.locale_text: Aus den alten, abgenutzten Lautsprechern ertönt ein Knistern und eine kaum hörbare traurige Melodie.

languages.text: De la poussière s'est accumulée sur les traces d'huile... De toute évidence, les serviteurs ne s'aventurent dans cette pièce que très rarement.
languages.original_text: Dust has accumulated on the raised oil smears — if servants ever access this room, they do so very rarely.

traits.locale_text: De la poussière s'est accumulée sur les traces d'huile... De toute évidence, les serviteurs ne s'aventurent dans cette pièce que très rarement.

languages.text: Yükselen yağ lekelerinde toz birikmiş. Hizmetkârların bu odaya girme izni varsa bile bunu çok ama çok nadiren yaptıkları belli.

traits.locale_text: Yükselen yağ lekelerinde toz birikmiş. Hizmetkârların bu odaya girme izni varsa bile bunu çok ama çok nadiren yaptıkları belli.
